title: transformation
extract: A transformation is a dramatic change in form or appearance. An important event like getting your driver's license, going to college, or getting married can cause a transformation in your life. A transformation is an extreme, radical change.
extract_html: A transformation is a dramatic change in form or appearance. An important event like getting your driver's license, going to college, or getting married can cause a transformation in your life. A transformation is an extreme, radical change.
